definition: to look at/to watch/to observe/to behold/to advise/concept/point of view/outlook
to harmonize/to reconcile/to blend/to suit well/to adjust/to regulate/to season (food)/to provoke/to incite
to transfer/to move (troops or cadres)/to investigate/to enquire into/accent/view/argument/key (in music)/mode (music)/tune/tone/melody
to control/to accuse/to charge/to sue/to invert a container to empty it/(suffix) (slang) buff/enthusiast/devotee/-phile or -philia

sentences.english: But this time, the advent of macro-control.
sentences.chinese: 但是这一次，出现的宏观调控。

sentences.english: And the macro-control measures need time to take effect.
sentences.chinese: 政府宏观调控的作用一段时间之后才能显现出来。

sentences.english: One feature of China's macro-regulation is the lengthening of the target plan.
sentences.chinese: 中国宏观调控的一个特点，是调控目标的长期化。

sentences.english: But the episode did lasting harm to the credibility of its macroeconomic stewardship.
sentences.chinese: 但是那件事却对政府的宏观调控信誉产生了持久伤害。

sentences.english: The research upon macro-control policy of lands started in China in mid-1990s.
sentences.chinese: 我国对土地政策宏观调控的研究起步于90年代中期。

sentences.english: Markets are mainly taken as the centre in the field of indirect adjustment and control.
sentences.chinese: 间接宏观调控的范围，主要是以市场为中心。

sentences.english: As a kind of economic lever, revenue exerts a strong macro-regulation function.
sentences.chinese: 税收作为一种经济杠杆，具有较强的宏观调控作用。

sentences.english: Achieving general equilibrium market is the basic aim of macro-economic regulation.
sentences.chinese: 实现市场总均衡是宏观调控的基本目标。

sentences.english: Encourage farmers to macro-control of cotton is a matter of urgency.
sentences.chinese: 鼓励农民种棉是宏观调控的当务之急。

sentences.english: This is the basic point of private right protection in macro-control.
sentences.chinese: 这是保护宏观调控私权的基本出发点。

sentences.english: "On Macromodulation in Socialist Market Economy", carried in People"s Daily, May , 199.
sentences.chinese: “论社会主义市场经济中的宏观调控”，载于民报。

sentences.english: The macro-control power is a public power according to its nature.
sentences.chinese: 宏观调控权就其性质来讲，它是一种公权。

sentences.english: The ways of how to holding the Olympic Games thriftily under the background of macro-economic control arc explored.
sentences.chinese: 同时还探寻了在宏观调控下节俭办奥运的途径。

sentences.english: Government to strengthen macro-control is to break the key to urban-rural dual structure.
sentences.chinese: 加强政府宏观调控是破解城乡二元结构的关键。

sentences.english: In addition the macroeconomic regulation and control, has the many small and medium-sized enterprise insufficient adaptations .
sentences.chinese: 再加上宏观调控，有很多中小企业不够适应。

sentences.english: First, we carried forward implementation of the major macro-control decisions and arrangements of the Central Committee.
sentences.chinese: 一是推动中央宏观调控重大决策部署的贯彻落实。

definition: financial leverage/leveraging (i.e. buying shares on borrowed funds)
stable prices/commodity prices fixed by government (in a command economy)/to valorize (a commodity)
Zhou Xiaochuan (1948-), PRC banker and politician, governor of People's Bank of China 中國人民銀行|中国人民银行[Zhong1 guo2 Ren2 min2 Yin2 hang2] from 2002
